name: Greed Run - Ludum Dare 27
description:
Run Through endless gold filled caves attempting to survive as long as possible taking the most gold to the next tier. 

Once you press any key the lava will start to rise, and you've got 10 seconds to collect everything and get to the next stage. 

Controls are tank/snake like, Up/Left/Right or W/A/D to move forward and turn. Space to jump. R or Right CTRL to Reset immediately (jam it if you want to see the levels generate). 


Plan your movements carefully. Jump pits, keep moving to avoid boulders (they are safe once they land). 

Tips: Let off the move key right as you hit the exit (you slide ever so slightly). The next levels lava won't start to rise until you press a key (this also stops you from diving straight into a pit). You can change directions mid air so if you're feeling gutsy you can get floating treasure from corners.
